hadith.chapter: The Book of Prayer (Travellers) - كتاب صلاة المسافرين وقصرها
hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا أبو بكر بن أبي شيبة، وأبو سعيد الأشج قالا حدثنا وكيع، عن الأعمش،عن أبي صالح، عن أبي هريرة، قال قال رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم ‏"‏ أيحب أحدكم إذا رجع إلى أهله أن يجد فيه ثلاث خلفات عظام سمان ‏"‏ ‏.‏ قلنا نعم ‏.‏ قال ‏"‏ فثلاث آيات يقرأ بهن أحدكم في صلاته خير له من ثلاث خلفات عظام سمان ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: 'Uqba b. 'Amir reported: When we were in Suffa, the Messenger of Allah (may peace be upon him) came out and said: Which of you would like to go out every morning to Buthan or al-'Aqiq and bring two large she-camels without being guilty of sin or without severing the ties of kinship? We said: Messenger of Allah, we would like to do it. Upon this he said: Does not one of you go out in the morning to the mosque and teach or recite two verses from the Book of Allah. the Majestic and Glorious? That is better for him than two she-camels, and three verses are better (than three she-camels). and four verses are better for him than four (she-camels), and to on their number in camels.
